translations.translation: So he shall have an agreeable life
Then he shall find himself in a life of bliss;
They will have a pleasant life
He is therefore in the desired serenity.
So, he shall be in a life, well-pleasing.
So he shall be in a life of pleasure,
So he shall be in a pleasing life
Then he will be in blissful state
so he will live in a state of Bliss
Then he shall be in a life well-pleasing -
So he will have a pleasant life,
And he will be in a life of Bliss,
So he shall be in a life, well-pleasing.
His shall be a pleasing life
So he will be in pleasant living.
So he will be in a pleasant life -
[69:21] So he will enjoy a pleasant living,
Then he will be in blissful state) he will be in a life with which he is pleased, i.e. a pleasing life.

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { فِي عِيشَةٍ رَّاضِيَةٍ } معناه مَرضيةٌ

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
{ فَهُوَ } حينئذٍ { فِي عِيشَةٍ رَّاضِيَةٍ } [الحاقة: 21] صاحبها عنها؛ لكونها صافية عن مطلق الكدورات




{ فِي جَنَّةٍ عَالِيَةٍ } [الحاقة: 22] رفيعة مكاناً ومكانة
